Author: HumanixR
Title: HumanixR (HNX) token pre-sale
Body: Announcing HumanixR Presale Duration - 20th May 2018 to 20th June 2018  Project Overview HumanixR is a Decentralized Application (DApp) built on top of Ethereum Blockchain that seeks to incentivize human interaction and pass on majority of the benefits to the community.  The overall theme is to leverage the community to provide humans with real time and personalized content â€“ enriching lives and enhancing experiences.  It represents the the next evolution of social networks and technology.  Problems we are Looking to Solve  The list problems being solved by our project -  Social Network: No Economic Benefit for Users Centralization and Censorship Do away with Intrusive Ads Data Privacy Concerns Lack of Real Time Validated Content  More details on how HumanixR is solving them can be found in our blog and whitepaper   Important Links  Website - Humanixr - ]https://www.humani[Suspicious link removed] Explainer Video - Humanixr - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=F03i1ukKFyw White paper - /whitepaper]https://www.humani[Suspicious link removed]/whitepaper Problems HumanixR intends to solve: https://medium.com/humanxir/problems-humanixr-intends-to-solve-7725f1ec8ccc Data Privacy & Tech Giants: An Honest Opinion: https://medium.com/humanxir/data-privacy-tech-giants-an-honest-opinion-54cb1d6f752f Transparency and Humanity: https://medium.com/humanxir/transparency-and-humanity-a0ec726f2d7c Rewarding People for their Insights:  https://medium.com/humanxir/rewarding-people-for-their-data-b697b1944f45  Social Media Links and Contacts  Email - info@humani[Suspicious link removed] Facebook - Humanixr - https://www.facebook.com/HumanixR/ Twitter - https://twitter.com/humanixR Telegram: https://t.me/HumanixR Medium: https://medium.com/@humanixr Steemit: https://steemit.com/@humanixr  We would love to discuss the project here and answer question

Author: Icohunter2030
Title: HumanixR (HNX) token pre-sale
Body: Charlie137 if you mean parent network as Eth then zess it is centralized to it..good observation   but at the end of the day Humanixr token is based on decentralised network which to my knowledge makes it decentralized. So it's comes down to basic MATH " Two lines parallel to same given line are parallel to each other"..this is how I am looking at this token..

Author: HumanixR
Title: HumanixR (HNX) token pre-sale
Body: Thanks for your interest and asking this. The parent network builds up on human interaction. On our network we have 2 main items that might address ur concerns, 1. We plan to enable rewards in other erc20 compliant tokens. 2. We will allow other dapps to access our human interaction apis as long as the rewards disbursed are meaningful for our community  does this answers your query?

Author: starblocks
Title: HumanixR (HNX) token pre-sale
Body: Who will be providing the escrow for the community rewards fund and how do you plan to grow your user base once the platform is launched?

Author: HumanixR
Title: HumanixR (HNX) token pre-sale
Body: We will have a separate module that handle the escrow smart contract. Withdrawal and deposits included. To grow the network we are planning to trigger a network effect, example if a person finds it profitable to use the network he is bound to tell his family and friends since that increases the value of his tokens. Also marketing through traditional marketing methods
